EquipmentCard

public EquipmentCard(int i,
                     java.lang.String n,
                     int v,
                     int b,
                     EquipmentCard.EquipmentType t,
                     boolean big,
                     boolean belowWaist,
                     boolean weapon)
Creates a new EquipmentCard Card.

Parameters:
i - unique id of the new card
n - name of the new card
v - the GP value of this card
b - the level bonus that this card gives
t - the equipment type of this card
big - whether or not this item is a big item
belowWaist - whether or not this item is an item worn below the waist
weapon - whether or not this item is a weapon
Method Detail

getBonus

public int getBonus(Player player)
Returns the level bonus that equipping this card gives for the given player.

Parameters:
player - the player to check the equipment bonus for
Returns:
the level bonus that equipping this card gives

getBonusToRace

public int getBonusToRace(Race race)
Returns the extra bonus that this card gives only to the given race. If the item can only be used by the given race then the full bonus will be returned. This method will be overridden by those monsters which have extra bonuses.

Parameters:
race - race to check
Returns:
the extra bonus that this card gives only to the given race

getBonusToClass

public int getBonusToClass(Class characterClass)
Returns the extra bonus that this card gives only to the given character class. If the item can only be used by the given character class then the full bonus will be returned; otherwise 0 will be returned.

Parameters:
characterClass - character class to check
Returns:
the extra bonus that this card gives only to the given character class

getEquipmentType

public EquipmentCard.EquipmentType getEquipmentType()
Returns the equipment type of this card.

Returns:
the equipment type of this card

isBig

public boolean isBig()
Returns whether or not this card is a big item.

Returns:
true if this card is a big item; false otherwise

isBelowWaist

public boolean isBelowWaist()
Returns whether or not this card is worn below the waist.

Returns:
true if this card is worn below the waist; false otherwise

isWeapon

public boolean isWeapon()
Returns whether or not this card is a weapon.

Returns:
true if this card is a weapon; false otherwise

equip

public java.lang.String equip(Player player)
Returns an empty string if this card can be equipped on the given player; otherwise returns the reason why it can't be equipped. This method is overridden to provide any special conditions on what player race/class/sex can't equip this item.

Parameters:
player - the player to test equip this item on
Returns:
a blank message if it can be equipped successfully; otherwise an error message of why the item can't be equipped
